existing_features.title: Display all 17 store sectors (Produce, Butcher, Fish, Bakery, Dairy, Frozen, Beverages, Snacks, Canned, Cleaning, Personal Care, Baby, Pet, Electronics, Clothing, Home, Pharmacy) as visible elements on the store floor canvas with their icons and names
Render products within their assigned sectors on the store floor, showing product names and stock levels from the initialProducts.ts data
Make the store floor interactive, allowing users to tap/click on sectors to view detailed information (quality, stock value, staff, cleanliness) similar to the SectorsPanel component
Add visual representation of shelves, aisles, and product displays within the store floor grid to create a realistic supermarket layout
